channel.title: Sequence Tagger on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy

item.title: Project 12: NLP - CRF Sequence BIO Tagger Implementation of the Movie Trivia
item.description: This project covers the implementation of the Conditional Random Field (CRF) sequence tagger for the movie trivia questions and answers private dataset with BIO (Beginning, Inside, Outside) tagging format. Tools & Technologies: Python (nltk, pycrfsuite, pandas, numpy, matplotlib), Github Link to Project’s GitHub Repository
